cosinnus.models.mixins package¶

cosinnus.models.mixins.images module¶

class cosinnus.models.mixins.images.ThumbnailableImageMixin(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

get_media_image_path(filename_modifier=None)¶

Gets the unique path for each image file in the media directory

image_attr_name = None¶
property is_image¶

can be override to use with FileFields where it’s not sure if it is an image

property sourcefilename¶

Must alwas return the original image’s filename. Can be overridden in case the original image was copied away.

static_image_original_url()¶

This function copies the image to its new path (if necessary) and returns the URL for the image to be displayed on the page. (Ex: ‘/media/cosinnus_files/images/dca2b30b1e07ed135c24d7dbd928e37523b474bb.jpg’)

It is a helper function to display cosinnus image files on the webpage.

The image file is copied to a general image folder in cosinnus_files, so the true image path is not shown to the client.

The image returned is the original, uncropped image.

static_image_url(size=None, filename_modifier=None)¶

This function copies the image to its new path (if necessary) and returns the URL for the image to be displayed on the page. (Ex: ‘/media/cosinnus_files/images/dca2b30b1e07ed135c24d7dbd928e37523b474bb.jpg’)

It is a helper function to display cosinnus image files on the webpage.

The image file is copied to a general image folder in cosinnus_files, so the true image path is not shown to the client.

cosinnus.models.mixins.translations module¶

class cosinnus.models.mixins.translations.TranslatableFormsetJsonFieldMixin¶

Bases: object

Model mixin that adds a helper function to receive a translated version of a formset json field.

get_translated_json_field(field_name)¶
class cosinnus.models.mixins.translations.TranslateableFieldsModelMixin(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Model

translations are saved liked that: {“<fieldname>”:

{“<language_code”: “foo”}, {“<another language_code”: “bar”}

} Special case - dynamic_fields: {“dynamic_fields”:

{“<language_code>”:

{“<fieldname”: “foo”}, {“<another fieldname”: “bar”}

}

} Be aware: only fields with translations of dynamic_fields are added to the translations json.

class Meta¶

Bases: object

abstract = False¶
dynamic_fields_settings = {}¶
get_dynamic_fields_with_translations(language)¶

Gets dynamic_fields from object and merges them with translations from translations json field

get_translateable_fields()¶
get_translated_dynamic_field(dynamic_field, language)¶

Return the translated value of a dynamic field.

get_translated_model_field(key, language)¶
get_translated_readonly_instance()¶

Return a translated readonly copy of this instance, where all translated fields are replaced with the final translated value. The save() and delete() functions are blocked to prevent accidental persisting of the fields.

property has_dynamic_field_translations¶
property languages¶
translatable_dynamic_fields = []¶
translateable_fields = []¶
translations¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.
